channel.title: 3blackgeeks's podcast
channel.description: 3 Black guys reppin all black geeks everywhere!!!! We review the best Black movies, Action, Martial Arts, Anime/Manga, Comics, and everything that white people think black people aren't into.
channel.itunes:author: Dee, CJ, DJ Tsu

item.title: Comic Book Corner - TMNT 2014
item.description: So the inevitable happened...Hollywood rebooted the TMNT franchise. What we end up getting is a Turtles reboot that isn't that bad when you consider the countless amounts of changes the property has had over the years and also that its a kids movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: So the inevitable happened...Hollywood rebooted the TMNT franchise. What we end up getting is a Turtles reboot that isn't that bad when you consider the countless amounts of changes the property has had over the years and also that its a kids movie.

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Ronin Warriors
item.description: Another old school anime that gained a massive following due in part to syndication and its run on the early days of Toonami, Ronin Warriors is a fun and enjoyable show that we dubbed the male "Sailor Moon". lol
item.itunes:subtitle: Another old school anime that gained a massive following due in part to syndication and its run on the early days of Toonami, Ronin Warriors is a fun and enjoyable show that we dubbed the male "Sailor Moon". lol

item.title: Comic Book Corner - Guardians of the Galaxy
item.description: Well Marvel took a big gamble with this property and they knocked it out of the park. Fun characters, simple plot, and great visuals really set the tone for how Marvel is doing the cosmic universe.
item.itunes:subtitle: Well Marvel took a big gamble with this property and they knocked it out of the park. Fun characters, simple plot, and great visuals really set the tone for how Marvel is doing the cosmic universe.

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Battle Arena Toshinden
item.description: Within the medium, you'd think fighting games would have it good when it comes to anime. Not so much. For the most part, fighting game anime is very hit and miss. More miss than hit and Battle Arena Toshinden is a huge miss with a flimsy plot that makes zero sense and characters coming and going throughout the OVA.
item.itunes:subtitle: Within the medium, you'd think fighting games would have it good when it comes to anime. Not so much. For the most part, fighting game anime is very hit and miss. More miss than hit and Battle Arena Toshinden is a huge miss with a flimsy plot that...

item.title: Comic Book Corner SDCC 2014 review
item.description: Joined up with Average Joe Art and BlackChivalrousNerd, we break down some of the happenings at this years San Diego Comic Con.
item.itunes:subtitle: Joined up with Average Joe Art and BlackChivalrousNerd, we break down some of the happenings at this years San Diego Comic Con.

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Outlaw Star
item.description: This was a Toonami classic that felt like watching Star Wars. A motley crew of people in space going on an adventure and fighting magic pirates and other shenanigans. Definitely a fun show to watch.
item.itunes:subtitle: This was a Toonami classic that felt like watching Star Wars. A motley crew of people in space going on an adventure and fighting magic pirates and other shenanigans. Definitely a fun show to watch.

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Fatal Fury series
item.description: Fighting game anime varies in quality. Sometimes they can be really good(SFII the movie) to the downright horrible(Art of Fighting). In between this we got a series of two OVA's and a movie based on a SNK franchise that more or less kicked off the KOF franchise of games. That series was called Fatal Fury.
item.itunes:subtitle: Fighting game anime varies in quality. Sometimes they can be really good(SFII the movie) to the downright horrible(Art of Fighting). In between this we got a series of two OVA's and a movie based on a SNK franchise that more or less kicked off the KOF...

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Dominion Tank Police
item.description: One of the most quirky anime that has surprisingly held up after so many years, Dominion Tank Police is an OVA that most people probably came across during the early days of anime back when the Sci-Fi channel used to show it.  Colorful characters, a plot that starts simple enough and turns into something convoluted, and good animation for its time, Tank Police is a show thats worth a watch.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the most quirky anime that has surprisingly held up after so many years, Dominion Tank Police is an OVA that most people probably came across during the early days of anime back when the Sci-Fi channel used to show it.  Colorful...

item.title: Comic Book Corner - Transformers Age of Extinction
item.description: So here we are with the fourth entry into the Michael Bay Transformer movies. Joined by Joey Romero and Prime Gundam, we chat about the movie. Is it an improvement over the previous movies or is it more of the same? Tune in and find out.
item.itunes:subtitle: So here we are with the fourth entry into the Michael Bay Transformer movies. Joined by Joey Romero and Prime Gundam, we chat about the movie. Is it an improvement over the previous movies or is it more of the same? Tune in and find out.

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - G Gundam
item.description: Ever wanted to know the anime equivalent to a competent Michael Bay movie? Well the answer is G Gundam, quite possibly the most fun and exciting giant robot anime you'll ever watch. Racist mobile suits, melodramatics, awesome action, fun characters. Its everything you could want from a show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ever wanted to know the anime equivalent to a competent Michael Bay movie? Well the answer is G Gundam, quite possibly the most fun and exciting giant robot anime you'll ever watch. Racist mobile suits, melodramatics, awesome action, fun characters....

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Project Ako
item.description: For most this was the show that got them into anime for others this was one of many anime's that was the gateway for people on the SciFi channel back in the day. Project Ako is a show that is wacky and fun and pokes fun at common anime tropes. Buckle up people, you're in for some fun time.
item.itunes:subtitle: For most this was the show that got them into anime for others this was one of many anime's that was the gateway for people on the SciFi channel back in the day. Project Ako is a show that is wacky and fun and pokes fun at common anime tropes. Buckle...

item.title: Summer of Anime '14 - Samurai Champloo
item.description: Shinichiro Watanabe knocks it out the park yet again with an anime thats near and dear to the greater anime community. A show that mixes rap and feudal japan shenanigans together to give a very good and fun story.
item.itunes:subtitle: Shinichiro Watanabe knocks it out the park yet again with an anime thats near and dear to the greater anime community. A show that mixes rap and feudal japan shenanigans together to give a very good and fun story.

item.title: New Jack City
item.description: So awhile back during our time on podomatic, we recorded an episode on New Jack City. Not too many people at the time listened to it so it sat on the backburner. Well now fresh out the archives, we bring you a movie that is near and dear to our hearts.
item.itunes:subtitle: So awhile back during our time on podomatic, we recorded an episode on New Jack City. Not too many people at the time listened to it so it sat on the backburner. Well now fresh out the archives, we bring you a movie that is near and dear to our hearts.

item.title: Comic Book Corner - Xmen Days of Future Past
item.description: The Xmen movies have definitely been a prominent fixture for awhile now. Will the newest movie put the franchise back on track or will it fall flat on its face? Check it out to find out.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Xmen movies have definitely been a prominent fixture for awhile now. Will the newest movie put the franchise back on track or will it fall flat on its face? Check it out to find out.

item.title: Comic Book Corner - Godzilla 2014
item.description: Back at it again and this time talking about the new Godzilla reboot. Joined up with Geek Sargon and Average Joe Art, we tackle whether this reboot truly honored the King of the Monsters or did it fall flat on its behind.
item.itunes:subtitle: Back at it again and this time talking about the new Godzilla reboot. Joined up with Geek Sargon and Average Joe Art, we tackle whether this reboot truly honored the King of the Monsters or did it fall flat on its behind.

item.title: It Came From the East 14' - My Boss My Hero
item.description: We love comedy no matter how goofy it is as long as its not of the braindead variety. So along comes a South Korean movie that has some wacky characters, funny moments, and a weird but laughable plot. Its an interesting movie to say the least.
item.itunes:subtitle: We love comedy no matter how goofy it is as long as its not of the braindead variety. So along comes a South Korean movie that has some wacky characters, funny moments, and a weird but laughable plot. Its an interesting movie to say the least.

item.title: It Came From the East '14 - Dragon Heat
item.description: From the guy that gave you Jet Li's Black Mask, Dragon Heat aka Dragon Squad has its good moments but it also has the issues that plagued Black Mask from the slow motion to the camera close ups during fights. Once you get past all that, you have a decent movie that also has Michael Beihn in it. Weird right? lol
item.itunes:subtitle: From the guy that gave you Jet Li's Black Mask, Dragon Heat aka Dragon Squad has its good moments but it also has the issues that plagued Black Mask from the slow motion to the camera close ups during fights. Once you get past all that, you have a...

item.title: Comic Book Corner: Amazing SpiderMan 2
item.description: The Amazing Spiderman 2 has finally come out. CJ, Average Joe, BlkChivalrousnerd, Dablackspawn and Geek Sargon have a roundtable discussion about the movie. Spoilers will be told.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Amazing Spiderman 2 has finally come out. CJ, Average Joe, BlkChivalrousnerd, Dablackspawn and Geek Sargon have a roundtable discussion about the movie. Spoilers will be told.

item.title: It Came From the East '14 - The Protector 2
item.description: At one point, Tony Jaa was the next action superstar after the likes of Ong Bak 1 and The Protector but somewhere during Ong Bak 2 and 3, people didn't care about him anymore. In come Protector 2 which initially many, including ourselves, were genuinly excited for it. What we ended up getting was a horrible action movie with some good fights. Tony Jaa deserves better than this!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: At one point, Tony Jaa was the next action superstar after the likes of Ong Bak 1 and The Protector but somewhere during Ong Bak 2 and 3, people didn't care about him anymore. In come Protector 2 which initially many, including ourselves, were...

item.title: Van Damage Month '14 - Replicant
item.description: Shortly after 9/11, we were graced with another JCVD Direct to DVD movie which on the surface could've been like an updated Double Impact but ended up being entirely different. The movie bounces around between what genres it wants to be but at the end of the day, its a decent watch. It is JCVD after all.
item.itunes:subtitle: Shortly after 9/11, we were graced with another JCVD Direct to DVD movie which on the surface could've been like an updated Double Impact but ended up being entirely different. The movie bounces around between what genres it wants to be but at the end...

item.title: Van Damage Month '14 - Cyborg
item.description: An early JCVD movie post-Bloodsport thats not too bad. It has some JCVD tropes, a legit, competent bad guy, and some pretty good action scenes. Only problem...This movie doesn't explain not a damn thing about its setting. You're left with a movie that literally has a meandering plot.
item.itunes:subtitle: An early JCVD movie post-Bloodsport thats not too bad. It has some JCVD tropes, a legit, competent bad guy, and some pretty good action scenes. Only problem...This movie doesn't explain not a damn thing about its setting. You're left with a movie that...

item.title: Van Damage Month '14 - Enemies Closer
item.description: Since Expendables 2, one thing we've noticed is that JCVD has fun when he's playing the villain. This movie is a great example of this. On top of that, this is actually a really solid and put together movie. Two good leads in Orlando Jones and Tom Everett Scott and good fighting choreography and a decent story.
item.itunes:subtitle: Since Expendables 2, one thing we've noticed is that JCVD has fun when he's playing the villain. This movie is a great example of this. On top of that, this is actually a really solid and put together movie. Two good leads in Orlando Jones and Tom...

item.title: Comic Book Corner: Captain America The Winter Soldier
item.description: CJ, Average Joe Art, BlackChivalrousnerd, and Arie of Official Review Podcast, talk about the new Captain America movie and other Marvel movies. Spoilers abound.
item.itunes:subtitle: CJ, Average Joe Art, BlackChivalrousnerd, and Arie of Official Review Podcast, talk about the new Captain America movie and other Marvel movies. Spoilers abound.

item.title: Van Damage Month '14 - TimeCop
item.description: One of the highest grossing JCVD movies and one with an interesting time travel element. Whereas most movies don't establish anything when it comes to time travel, this movie does a decent job of establishing how it handles it. Along with that, we get some good action beats and JCVD rockin a mullet.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of the highest grossing JCVD movies and one with an interesting time travel element. Whereas most movies don't establish anything when it comes to time travel, this movie does a decent job of establishing how it handles it. Along with that, we get...

item.title: Copland
item.description: So here's a movie where Stallone was legitimately acting his ass off. We all knew he was a good actor but around the time of this movie he was starting to go on the backburner in the public eye. In comes James Mangold to give us a basic movie about corrupt cops and essentially doing the right thing. Its a very good and underrated movie with a stellar cast of actors.
item.itunes:subtitle: So here's a movie where Stallone was legitimately acting his ass off. We all knew he was a good actor but around the time of this movie he was starting to go on the backburner in the public eye. In comes James Mangold to give us a basic movie about...

item.title: Hard To Kill
item.description: Steven Seagal was that action star that was very simple and was never really flashy with his moves. Hard To Kill was one of his earlier movies thats a simple revenge story. Nothing more, nothing less and it works. Entertaining movie all around.
item.itunes:subtitle: Steven Seagal was that action star that was very simple and was never really flashy with his moves. Hard To Kill was one of his earlier movies thats a simple revenge story. Nothing more, nothing less and it works. Entertaining movie all around.

item.title: Point Break
item.description: With a plotline often duplicated by other movies but ony really succeeding once, Point Break is a very enjoyable, simple movie involving cops and robbers. Patrick Swayze is as charismatic as he always is and Keanu Reeves is pretty good as well despite the bad rap he gets as an actor.
item.itunes:subtitle: With a plotline often duplicated by other movies but ony really succeeding once, Point Break is a very enjoyable, simple movie involving cops and robbers. Patrick Swayze is as charismatic as he always is and Keanu Reeves is pretty good as well despite...

item.title: Broken Arrow
item.description: This movie is very conflicting. John Woo is coming off of Hard Target which had every staple of his Hong Kong action touch in it from the slow motion gunkata to the doves to the unlimited shootouts where nobody reloads. Broken Arrow on the other hand? Didn't have none of that. At the end of the day, it comes off like a typical 90's action movie but slightly better. The movie has its moments and its worth a watch though.
item.itunes:subtitle: This movie is very conflicting. John Woo is coming off of Hard Target which had every staple of his Hong Kong action touch in it from the slow motion gunkata to the doves to the unlimited shootouts where nobody reloads. Broken Arrow on the other hand?...

item.title: The Wash
item.description: The Wash is like a throwback to the old 1976 classic, Car Wash. You gets lots of crazy characters, cameo appearrances from celebs, and a paper thin plot.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Wash is like a throwback to the old 1976 classic, Car Wash. You gets lots of crazy characters, cameo appearrances from celebs, and a paper thin plot.

item.title: The Oral History of Rocafella Records
item.description: We talke mainly on Reasonable Doubt, Memphis Bleek sucking, Dame and Jigga's fallout, 50 Cent being a troll, how Dipset took over, Just Blaze, Jim Jones sucking as a writer and the Roc's collapse. Standard hip hop stuff. Must listen if you're a hip hop head.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talke mainly on Reasonable Doubt, Memphis Bleek sucking, Dame and Jigga's fallout, 50 Cent being a troll, how Dipset took over, Just Blaze, Jim Jones sucking as a writer and the Roc's collapse. Standard hip hop stuff. Must listen if you're a hip...

item.title: Hot Boyz
item.description: Master P had an empire in No Limit records and love them or hate them, they cranked out some classics. So obviously doing movies with artists from the label is the next logical step. Hot Boyz is one of the movies that has a decent budget to it especially when you get actors like Gary Busey and C. Thomas Howell. Does that make it a good movie though? Gonna have to give this episode a listen and find out.
item.itunes:subtitle: Master P had an empire in No Limit records and love them or hate them, they cranked out some classics. So obviously doing movies with artists from the label is the next logical step. Hot Boyz is one of the movies that has a decent budget to it...

item.title: Killa Season
item.description: You've seen plenty of movies that starred rappers but there was a time where rappers directed and starred in their own movies. Low budget as they were, these movies really weren't that good. In particular this one from one of our favorite rappers, Camron. He previously starred in a great movie called Paid In Full and you can tell in this movie, he's the only one thats legitimately giving a shit and acting. Its a bad movie all around.
item.itunes:subtitle: You've seen plenty of movies that starred rappers but there was a time where rappers directed and starred in their own movies. Low budget as they were, these movies really weren't that good. In particular this one from one of our favorite rappers,...

item.title: The Running Man
item.description: Another one of Arnold's classic 80's movies, this is one of his movies that had an all star cast of 80's action heroes from Jim Brown to Jessie Ventura. We even get good ole Richard Dawson himself playing the bad guy and he is sooo good at it.
item.itunes:subtitle: Another one of Arnold's classic 80's movies, this is one of his movies that had an all star cast of 80's action heroes from Jim Brown to Jessie Ventura. We even get good ole Richard Dawson himself playing the bad guy and he is sooo good at it.

item.title: Batman: TAS/Batman Beyond
item.description: This is the series that EVERYBODY grew up on and is the definitive Batman properties that you have to watch. It appealed to everyone young and old and all the credit goes to Bruce Timm, Dini, and Co for crafting this awesome Batman universe.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is the series that EVERYBODY grew up on and is the definitive Batman properties that you have to watch. It appealed to everyone young and old and all the credit goes to Bruce Timm, Dini, and Co for crafting this awesome Batman universe.

item.title: DBZ Buu Saga Part 2
item.description: We finally made it to the end of DBZ. It was a long road but the show ended on a decent note. Lots of crazy fights still left and a finale where we get a hard fought fight between Goku and Kid Buu.
item.itunes:subtitle: We finally made it to the end of DBZ. It was a long road but the show ended on a decent note. Lots of crazy fights still left and a finale where we get a hard fought fight between Goku and Kid Buu.

item.title: DBZ Buu Saga Part 1
item.description: Well, we made it to the finale of DBZ. This was a saga is still to this day very divisive to the DBZ fandom. Some like it and others hate it. We're definitely in the middle of the road with it.
item.itunes:subtitle: Well, we made it to the finale of DBZ. This was a saga is still to this day very divisive to the DBZ fandom. Some like it and others hate it. We're definitely in the middle of the road with it.

item.title: Max Payne
item.description: Certainly isn't the worst video game adaptation and lord knows it tried but this movie made some missteps that baffles the mind at times. Its a decent entertainment at the end of the day.
item.itunes:subtitle: Certainly isn't the worst video game adaptation and lord knows it tried but this movie made some missteps that baffles the mind at times. Its a decent entertainment at the end of the day.

item.title: Black Dynamite
item.description: Quite possibly the funniest movie EVER, this film catches you off guard with how good they parody the blaxsploitation genre so much. Its the little things that have you laughing even harder.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite possibly the funniest movie EVER, this film catches you off guard with how good they parody the blaxsploitation genre so much. Its the little things that have you laughing even harder.

item.title: Commando
item.description: This movie is a summation of everything that is awesome about an Arnold movie and everything that is silly and stupid about his movies and yet its adored by everyone. Just goes to show how damn entertaining this movie is.
item.itunes:subtitle: This movie is a summation of everything that is awesome about an Arnold movie and everything that is silly and stupid about his movies and yet its adored by everyone. Just goes to show how damn entertaining this movie is.

item.title: The Best Man
item.description: They don't make movies like this much nowadays. As it stands, we enjoy this movie and that time period where black movies were coming out in droves at the time with movies like The Wood, Love Jones, and the Brothers to name a few.
item.itunes:subtitle: They don't make movies like this much nowadays. As it stands, we enjoy this movie and that time period where black movies were coming out in droves at the time with movies like The Wood, Love Jones, and the Brothers to name a few.

item.title: Beetlejuice
item.description: Love this movie to death. If you never thought Michael Keaton could be funny, well this movie proves you wrong. Top to bottom, beginning to end, a solid movie and worth watching.
item.itunes:subtitle: Love this movie to death. If you never thought Michael Keaton could be funny, well this movie proves you wrong. Top to bottom, beginning to end, a solid movie and worth watching.

item.title: The Addams Family
item.description: We love both of these movies equally and Raul Julia is the glue that holds both of the these movie together but the rest of the cast do a damn good job as well. The humor still holds to this day.
item.itunes:subtitle: We love both of these movies equally and Raul Julia is the glue that holds both of the these movie together but the rest of the cast do a damn good job as well. The humor still holds to this day.

item.title: Resident Evil Film series
item.description: Paul WS Anderson has a way of giving people fan service and at the same time shitting all over the fans. Nothing encompasses that more than the Resident Evil Film series.  3 out of 5 of these movie do a servicable job with the property and the other 2 is whats wrong when you try to stick to the stuff that worked in the video games and also when you diverge waaay off from the source material. Very polarizing stuff.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul WS Anderson has a way of giving people fan service and at the same time shitting all over the fans. Nothing encompasses that more than the Resident Evil Film series.  3 out of 5 of these movie do a servicable job with the property and the...

item.title: Crocodile Dundee Trilogy
item.description: This is one of those trilogy of movies that is really endearing and chuckle worthy from beginning to end despite the fact that the 3rd movie came out so ridiculously late.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is one of those trilogy of movies that is really endearing and chuckle worthy from beginning to end despite the fact that the 3rd movie came out so ridiculously late.

item.title: Gundam Wing
item.description: Beloved anime and one of the first anime that probably got people interested in the Gundam series overall, thanks to Toonami, Gundam Wing blew up into one of the best mecha anime to watch.
item.itunes:subtitle: Beloved anime and one of the first anime that probably got people interested in the Gundam series overall, thanks to Toonami, Gundam Wing blew up into one of the best mecha anime to watch.

item.title: Harlem Nights
item.description: The film that brought together legendary comedians from old to new but also at the same time was bashed by film critics. Kinda baffling when you think about it.
item.itunes:subtitle: The film that brought together legendary comedians from old to new but also at the same time was bashed by film critics. Kinda baffling when you think about it.

item.title: TMNT Movie series
item.description: Quite possibly the most beloved movie franchise(Well at least the 1st two movies and TMNT somewhat), we dive into this franchise and dish out our thoughts with special guest, Average Joe Art.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite possibly the most beloved movie franchise(Well at least the 1st two movies and TMNT somewhat), we dive into this franchise and dish out our thoughts with special guest, Average Joe Art.

item.title: Michael Jackson Tribute
item.description: What is there to say about the greatest musician in existance? Michael Jackson has a career that many artists dream of having. A catalogue of hit records, hit singles, and just flat out godlike live performances. We honor MJ by talking about his illustrious career from beginning to end.
item.itunes:subtitle: What is there to say about the greatest musician in existance? Michael Jackson has a career that many artists dream of having. A catalogue of hit records, hit singles, and just flat out godlike live performances. We honor MJ by talking about his...

item.title: Players Club
item.description: This movie...where to start. Lets see, Ice Cube's first directorial effort, introduction to Bernie Mac and Lisa Raye, a pretty good soundtrack, and crazy nonsense throughout.
item.itunes:subtitle: This movie...where to start. Lets see, Ice Cube's first directorial effort, introduction to Bernie Mac and Lisa Raye, a pretty good soundtrack, and crazy nonsense throughout.

item.title: Under Siege
item.description: We all love Steven Seagal and the excellent movies he churned out in the 90's and this is one of them. A competent plot, crazy Gary Busey, and even Tommy Lee Jones as a bad guy. Who knew you could get all this in one movie. Craziness.
item.itunes:subtitle: We all love Steven Seagal and the excellent movies he churned out in the 90's and this is one of them. A competent plot, crazy Gary Busey, and even Tommy Lee Jones as a bad guy. Who knew you could get all this in one movie. Craziness.

item.title: Cowboy Bebop
item.description: Out of all the anime that is beloved by the community, this anime gets a lot of love and for the right reasons. Solid story, characters you care about, and awesome music. Its no wonder that it still holds up to this day.
item.itunes:subtitle: Out of all the anime that is beloved by the community, this anime gets a lot of love and for the right reasons. Solid story, characters you care about, and awesome music. Its no wonder that it still holds up to this day.

item.title: Con Air
item.description: This is a very bizarre movie in a good way. Lots of characters actors that everybody knows and loves and Nicolas Cage trying his best southern accent.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a very bizarre movie in a good way. Lots of characters actors that everybody knows and loves and Nicolas Cage trying his best southern accent.

item.title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare Series
item.description: Lets be real, many people could give two craps about the Call of Duty Modern Warfare series in terms of its story because honestly people have the game for the multiplayer BUT the storyline for this series ain't that bad and it definitely has tons of tropes taken from Hollywood action movies that are rememberable.
item.itunes:subtitle: Lets be real, many people could give two craps about the Call of Duty Modern Warfare series in terms of its story because honestly people have the game for the multiplayer BUT the storyline for this series ain't that bad and it definitely has tons of...

item.title: Rambo series
item.description: What can be said about this series that hasn't already been said? Lots of action, lots of drama, and some decent acting. Somehow Stallone managed to pull off a good to decent series of movies.
item.itunes:subtitle: What can be said about this series that hasn't already been said? Lots of action, lots of drama, and some decent acting. Somehow Stallone managed to pull off a good to decent series of movies.

item.title: DBZ Cell Saga Part 2
item.description: Wherein we cover the second half of the Cell Saga. Betrayals, Epic fights, shenangans from side characters. All the tropes that DBZ is known for.
item.itunes:subtitle: Wherein we cover the second half of the Cell Saga. Betrayals, Epic fights, shenangans from side characters. All the tropes that DBZ is known for.

item.title: DBZ Cell Saga Part 1
item.description: Quite possibly one of the most beloved sagas and pretty much where DBZ should have ended, we dive into the first half of the Cell series with the Android Saga.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite possibly one of the most beloved sagas and pretty much where DBZ should have ended, we dive into the first half of the Cell series with the Android Saga.

item.title: Predator movie trilogy
item.description: Compared to the Alien series, the Predator franchise has the fortunate circumstance of actually being a solid trilogy of films despite whatever misgivings people have with Predator 2. We get down to the nitty gritty on all 3 movies.
item.itunes:subtitle: Compared to the Alien series, the Predator franchise has the fortunate circumstance of actually being a solid trilogy of films despite whatever misgivings people have with Predator 2. We get down to the nitty gritty on all 3 movies.

item.title: It Came From The East '13 - Hard Boiled
item.description: This movie has been an influence for a lot of action cinema. A good story, well directed action sequences, and characters you root for and love. Hard Boiled is a damn good movie that deserves the praise even to this day.
item.itunes:subtitle: This movie has been an influence for a lot of action cinema. A good story, well directed action sequences, and characters you root for and love. Hard Boiled is a damn good movie that deserves the praise even to this day.

item.title: It Came From The East 13' - Power Kids
item.description: Since 3 Ninjas, not many movies have tried to duplicate that movie. I mean its already a bizarre idea anyways BUT lo and behold, Thailand decided to do it and it actually comes off believable. A lot of that had to do with the awesome martial arts and stunt talents of the kids and one Johnny Nyugen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Since 3 Ninjas, not many movies have tried to duplicate that movie. I mean its already a bizarre idea anyways BUT lo and behold, Thailand decided to do it and it actually comes off believable. A lot of that had to do with the awesome martial arts and...

item.title: The Dark Knight Trilogy
item.description: The Nolan Batman trilogy is held up as one of the best movie trilogy's. But is it? We do a breakdown of each movie in our own funny way to answer that.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Nolan Batman trilogy is held up as one of the best movie trilogy's. But is it? We do a breakdown of each movie in our own funny way to answer that.

item.title: It Came From The East '13 - Volcano High
item.description: This is one of those situations where America or should I say MTV, took a decent Korean movie and botched it up with bad dubbing. And its not even the good kind dubbing where you can see the effort. Pretty cringeworthy stuff but we dig into this gem of a movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is one of those situations where America or should I say MTV, took a decent Korean movie and botched it up with bad dubbing. And its not even the good kind dubbing where you can see the effort. Pretty cringeworthy stuff but we dig into this gem...

item.title: It Came From The East '13 - The Protector
item.description: The movie that literally made Tony Jaa a household name and the movie where Jaa peaked, The Protector is a good action flick despite the semi flimsy story.
item.itunes:subtitle: The movie that literally made Tony Jaa a household name and the movie where Jaa peaked, The Protector is a good action flick despite the semi flimsy story.

item.title: Van Damage Month '13 - Hard Target
item.description: A very underrated John Woo movie that people initially panned upon its first theater run but quickly ended being a classic afterwards. What is there to say about this awesome movie?
item.itunes:subtitle: A very underrated John Woo movie that people initially panned upon its first theater run but quickly ended being a classic afterwards. What is there to say about this awesome movie?

item.title: VanDamage Month '13 - Universal Soldier
item.description: One of Van Damme's best films and when you got action scenes that are great and Lundgren obviously having a field day playing his role, you got a good and fun movie on your hands.
item.itunes:subtitle: One of Van Damme's best films and when you got action scenes that are great and Lundgren obviously having a field day playing his role, you got a good and fun movie on your hands.

item.title: VanDamage Month '13 - Double Team
item.description: What happens when you combine JCVD with Mickey Rourke and Dennis Rodman? You get this craziness of a movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: What happens when you combine JCVD with Mickey Rourke and Dennis Rodman? You get this craziness of a movie.

item.title: VanDamage Month '13- The Quest
item.description: An enjoyable JCVD movie that is a mixed bag. Comes off as a Bloodsport-lite with a mixture of themes from Street Fighter and Mortal Kombat. Either which way its a Van Damme movie so you already know its gonna be a fun ride from beginning to end.
item.itunes:subtitle: An enjoyable JCVD movie that is a mixed bag. Comes off as a Bloodsport-lite with a mixture of themes from Street Fighter and Mortal Kombat. Either which way its a Van Damme movie so you already know its gonna be a fun ride from beginning to end.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Part 2
item.description: Time to finish up this series and a great podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Time to finish up this series and a great podcast.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Part 1
item.description: The Metal Gear Solid is a staple in video game history. So the 3 black guys crack this egg and get all up in it!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Metal Gear Solid is a staple in video game history. So the 3 black guys crack this egg and get all up in it!

item.title: Death Wish Series
item.description: A series that went from being a serious to all out wacky and fun by the 3rd movie. The Death Wish series is a good and fun set of movies to watch if only because of the swagger of Charles Bronson and his one liners.
item.itunes:subtitle: A series that went from being a serious to all out wacky and fun by the 3rd movie. The Death Wish series is a good and fun set of movies to watch if only because of the swagger of Charles Bronson and his one liners.

item.title: Bad Boys Series
item.description: The Bad Boys series is an example of just how far Michael Bay has come as a director. Bad Boys 1 was a very safe action movie that did well and got Bay's foot in the door while Bad Boys 2 personified the Michael Bay tropes we've seen in his recent movies like the Transformers trilogy. Love him or hate it, the man can do action and the Bad Boys movies have them in spades.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Bad Boys series is an example of just how far Michael Bay has come as a director. Bad Boys 1 was a very safe action movie that did well and got Bay's foot in the door while Bad Boys 2 personified the Michael Bay tropes we've seen in his recent...

item.title: A Low Down Dirty Shame
item.description: They honestly don't make movies like this anymore. A very well made and funny Keenan Ivory Wayans gem with a semi-memorable cast of characters.
item.itunes:subtitle: They honestly don't make movies like this anymore. A very well made and funny Keenan Ivory Wayans gem with a semi-memorable cast of characters.

item.title: Shaft 2000
item.description: A very enjoyable movie thats a damn good remake of a classic blacksploitation.
item.itunes:subtitle: A very enjoyable movie thats a damn good remake of a classic blacksploitation.

item.title: Original Gangstas
item.description: This is what happens when you group together the blacksploitation heroes of the 70's in one movie. A very interesting movie that has a huge cast of familiar faces all around. Some people call it the pre-cursor to  The Expendables.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is what happens when you group together the blacksploitation heroes of the 70's in one movie. A very interesting movie that has a huge cast of familiar faces all around. Some people call it the pre-cursor to  The Expendables.

item.title: Eddie Murphy Month- Coming To America
item.description: We round out Eddie Murphy month with a classic movie that is funny from beginning to end. When you talk about definitive Eddie Murphy movies, this was the one movie that told you everything you needed to know on how funny he truly is. One of the best comedy's that still holds up to this day. Our bys from VillainsVNS join us on this show.
item.itunes:subtitle: We round out Eddie Murphy month with a classic movie that is funny from beginning to end. When you talk about definitive Eddie Murphy movies, this was the one movie that told you everything you needed to know on how funny he truly is. One of the best...

item.title: Eddie Murphy Month- Beverly Hills Cop Trilogy
item.description: Quite possibly the most solid and funny trilogy of movies you'll ever watch. The Beverly Hills Cop series is a fun ride and it definitely showcased Eddie Murphy's comedic talents.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite possibly the most solid and funny trilogy of movies you'll ever watch. The Beverly Hills Cop series is a fun ride and it definitely showcased Eddie Murphy's comedic talents.

item.title: Eddie Murphy Month- Vampire In Brooklyn
item.description: A bit of an underrated and sort of underappreciated Eddie Murphy movie. Kinda like a prelude to the Nutty Professor movies in terms of the variety of characters he plays here. Listen in as we dig in on this gem.
item.itunes:subtitle: A bit of an underrated and sort of underappreciated Eddie Murphy movie. Kinda like a prelude to the Nutty Professor movies in terms of the variety of characters he plays here. Listen in as we dig in on this gem.

item.title: Fighting Game Movies
item.description: Everybody loves a good fighting game whether it be Street Fighter, Tekken, or Mortal Kombat. Hollywood is infamous for tapping into that market and raping the fighting genre for what its worth with the live action movies. We tackle the best and worst of the crop.
item.itunes:subtitle: Everybody loves a good fighting game whether it be Street Fighter, Tekken, or Mortal Kombat. Hollywood is infamous for tapping into that market and raping the fighting genre for what its worth with the live action movies. We tackle the best and worst...

item.title: 3BlackGeeks Christmas Special 2012!- Die Hard 2
item.description: This time the guys Die Harder with special guest Jayton from Villains Never Sleep. The boys make connects to "Coming to America" "Beastmaster" "Trespass" "Terminator 2" "Surrogates" and "Boyz In The Hood". Enjoy this podcast and HO HO HO!
item.itunes:subtitle: This time the guys Die Harder with special guest Jayton from Villains Never Sleep. The boys make connects to "Coming to America" "Beastmaster" "Trespass" "Terminator 2" "Surrogates" and "Boyz In The Hood". Enjoy this podcast and HO HO HO!

item.title: Goodfellas/Casino
item.description: The geeks hold these two movies in high regard because they are the gold standard when it comes to mob movies next to The Godfather series of course. So many memorable scenes and standout acting all around and we delved into it. Enjoy.
item.itunes:subtitle: The geeks hold these two movies in high regard because they are the gold standard when it comes to mob movies next to The Godfather series of course. So many memorable scenes and standout acting all around and we delved into it. Enjoy.

item.title: Meteor Man
item.description: You know back in the early 90's, black people really got the crap end of the stick on superhero movies and as much as the geeks love Robert Townsend, this movie makes you facepalm from beginning to end. Its Meteor Man people. Enjoy!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: You know back in the early 90's, black people really got the crap end of the stick on superhero movies and as much as the geeks love Robert Townsend, this movie makes you facepalm from beginning to end. Its Meteor Man people. Enjoy!!!

item.title: DBZ- Frieza Saga Part 2
item.description: Because we love Dragon Ball soooooo much we're back with the Frieza Saga. The saga that defined Dragon Ball Z. All the good and very bad of this anime formed from this saga. So let's get to it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Because we love Dragon Ball soooooo much we're back with the Frieza Saga. The saga that defined Dragon Ball Z. All the good and very bad of this anime formed from this saga. So let's get to it!

item.description: One of the classic anime's that we got into along with Akira. Bloody, violent, and crazy characters make for a staple movie that you gotta see.

item.title: Belly
item.description: Maybe the greatest hip-hop ever made. The geeks speak on this instant classic...and what the hell was so special about "Africa".
item.itunes:subtitle: Maybe the greatest hip-hop ever made. The geeks speak on this instant classic...and what the hell was so special about "Africa".

item.title: Demolition Man
item.description: Quite possibly one of Sly's entertaining movie. Definitely different from the normal movies he's done. The humor was on point and the action that was there was definitely entertaining. Also, Wesley Snipes was clearly having fun as bad guy Simon Pheonix. We miss those kind of villians nowadays.
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite possibly one of Sly's entertaining movie. Definitely different from the normal movies he's done. The humor was on point and the action that was there was definitely entertaining. Also, Wesley Snipes was clearly having fun as bad guy Simon...

item.title: Cobra
item.description: Cobra is a supremely underrated Stallone flick that not too many people talk about. On top of Stallone, you got Bridgett Nielson(back when she was the type of chick you wanted to bang) and then you got king of cheese and chewing the scenery, Brian fucking Thompson. Listen up and enjoy.

item.title: Halloween Special - Tales From The Hood
item.description: The movie that made the black horror genre suck a little less. Its comedy...the podcast and the movie. Not really scary...the movie not so much the podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: The movie that made the black horror genre suck a little less. Its comedy...the podcast and the movie. Not really scary...the movie not so much the podcast.

item.title: House Party 3
item.description: This movie should've been like Class Act...funny and enjoyable but it wasn't. Instead we got a mediocre movie where the supporting cast(mainly Bernie Mac) end up carrying the movie. Nonetheless, despite the mediocrity, there are some funny moments.
item.itunes:subtitle: This movie should've been like Class Act...funny and enjoyable but it wasn't. Instead we got a mediocre movie where the supporting cast(mainly Bernie Mac) end up carrying the movie. Nonetheless, despite the mediocrity, there are some funny moments.

item.title: Class Act
item.description: Out of all four Kid N Play movies, this is an underrated gem.
item.itunes:subtitle: Out of all four Kid N Play movies, this is an underrated gem.

item.title: House Party 2
item.description: Despite the plot being all over the place at times, this is still a fun and classic movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: Despite the plot being all over the place at times, this is still a fun and classic movie.

item.title: House Party
item.description: It's Kid N Play month and whats a better way to kick it off than to talk about a solid and classic movie.
item.itunes:subtitle: It's Kid N Play month and whats a better way to kick it off than to talk about a solid and classic movie.

item.title: DBZ - The Saiyan Saga
item.description: Dragonball Z by miles is the 3BlackGeeks favorite anime. Now its time for us to go deep, deep, deep into Akira Toriyama's lovechild and create a lovechild with that one!
item.itunes:subtitle: Dragonball Z by miles is the 3BlackGeeks favorite anime. Now its time for us to go deep, deep, deep into Akira Toriyama's lovechild and create a lovechild with that one!

item.title: Van Damage Month - Bloodsport
item.description: This is maybe the best movie JCVD has ever done. A few reasons. 1) Forest Whitaker 2)Stereotypical Arab 3) oh yeah FUCKING BOLO! But honestly this movie is awesome!
item.itunes:subtitle: This is maybe the best movie JCVD has ever done. A few reasons. 1) Forest Whitaker 2)Stereotypical Arab 3) oh yeah FUCKING BOLO! But honestly this movie is awesome!

item.title: Van Damage Month - Double Impact
item.description:
JCVD is one of our favorite action stars. The man is French but 7 times out of 10 he plays an American. You can rarely understand every word he ever fucking says. He...he...has no strong acting method but fuck it he tries!

Our first movie in Van Damage month is Double Impact. A movie where JCVD is so badass he plays himself twice. Now just count the damn plot holes and the cheap pop moments. Oh yeah, FUCKING BOLO IS IN THIS MOVIE!
item.itunes:subtitle: JCVD is one of our favorite action stars. The man is French but 7 times out of 10 he plays an American. You can rarely understand every word he ever fucking says. He...he...has no strong acting method but fuck it he tries! Our first movie in Van...

item.title: Trespass
item.description: A movie that many forget about. Trespass is one of those movies where everything can go right and wrong at the same time. What makes this more better, Dee has never seen this movie while DjTsu and Cj knows the movie like the back of their hands. So not only is Ice T and Ice Cube in this movie. The fucking Grim Reaper from Bill and Ted is in this movie. And to make it more better, the director of "Back To The Future" "Forest Gump" "Cast Away" and "Who's Framing Roger Rabbit" wrote this movie. I wish I made that up! This is truly one of our best podcast!
item.itunes:subtitle: A movie that many forget about. Trespass is one of those movies where everything can go right and wrong at the same time. What makes this more better, Dee has never seen this movie while DjTsu and Cj knows the movie like the back of their hands. So...

item.title: Golgo 13
item.description: In this podcast it's just Cj and Dee talking about Golgo 13. The anime Gods must be happy someone is giving this series praise. Seriously. NO ONE LOOKS AT THIS ANIME! But the cult following it has knows the fucking name Duke Togo. Everytime that name is said a man gets laid somewhere in world with a hooker who doesn't fake it and said hooker falls in love with him.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this podcast it's just Cj and Dee talking about Golgo 13. The anime Gods must be happy someone is giving this series praise. Seriously. NO ONE LOOKS AT THIS ANIME! But the cult following it has knows the fucking name Duke Togo. Everytime that name...

item.title: 3BG Christmas Special...Die Hard
item.description: When you think of Christmas movies most people like to say, "How the Grinch Stole Christmas"; "A Christmas Story"; "It's A Wonderful Life"; "Miracle On 34th Street"...we said go SCREW!!! Flipping Die Hard is the greatest Christmas movie that has very little to do with Christmas. In fact outside of the tree in the Nakatomi tower, there is jack to do with Christmas in this movie. But this podcast is to praise Bruce Willis' best movie and the best action movie of the 80's.
item.itunes:subtitle: When you think of Christmas movies most people like to say, "How the Grinch Stole Christmas"; "A Christmas Story"; "It's A Wonderful Life"; "Miracle On 34th Street"...we said go SCREW!!! Flipping Die Hard is the greatest Christmas movie that has very...

item.title: Meltdown (aka High Risk)
item.description: We've seen a few movies starring our boy Jet Li. For the most part good movies...then we get this. Not a bad movie but damn it. It's Die Hard! It's so clearly Die Hard! Hong Kong's anwser to Die Hard, MELTDOWN! Check out the US box art. So not Jet Li.
item.itunes:subtitle: We've seen a few movies starring our boy Jet Li. For the most part good movies...then we get this. Not a bad movie but damn it. It's Die Hard! It's so clearly Die Hard! Hong Kong's anwser to Die Hard, MELTDOWN! Check out the US box art. So not Jet...

item.title: Rocky (Series)
item.description:
The first one was a classic, the second one was great, the third one had Mr. T, the fourth one was for America, the fifth one was for Stallone's wallet, and Balboa was for the true fans.

Folks these movies were awesome, so the guys decided to just make their first movie podcast about the Rocky series. Now three black guys from DC talking about the "Rocky" series...It goes without saying, Rocky has kicked the ass of Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, Antonio Tarver and (if you wanna count him) the fake Don King guy in the fifth movie. So by all means the geeks should hate the fact Rocky has laid out four black guys and one Russian. But why do we love him? Well listen and find out.
item.itunes:subtitle:
The first one was a classic, the second one was great, the third one had Mr. T, the fourth one was for America, the fifth one was for Stallone's wallet, and Balboa was for the true fans.
Folks these movies were awesome, so the guys decided to just...

item.title: 3BG Beginnings
item.description: Well folks this was our first podcast that kicked it off. Give it a listen and get to know who we are.
item.itunes:subtitle: Well folks this was our first podcast that kicked it off. Give it a listen and get to know who we are.
